main.name: Hey, my name is Veselin
main.description: I build applications that scale and deliver the best possible UX across different browsers.I put my focus on cost efficiency, scalability and maintainability.
main.bio: Iâ€™m a enthusiastic front-end developer based out of Samora Correia, Santarem Portugal , and I create fun, innovative, accessible, and fast websites. I try to leave every bit of code I touch more readable, modular, performant and accessible than I found it.On a team, I tend to help bring out a clearer sense of purpose and encourage clearer communication, resulting in better team results and a higher sense of satisfaction for all involved.
